resources.string: "The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.¨ \n – Ralph Waldo Emerson
“Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit.¨ \n ― Vince Lombardi Jr
¨A year from now you may wish you had started today.¨ \n – Karen Lamb
¨Look in the mirror. That’s your competition.¨ \n – John Assaraf
¨A feeble body weakens the mind.¨ \n – Jean-Jacques Rousseau
¨Put all excuses aside and remember this: You are capable.¨ \n – Zig Ziglar
¨Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.¨ \n - Joseph Addison
¨Success is what comes after your stop making excuses.¨ \n – Luis Galarza
¨The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.¨ \n – Arnold Schwarzenegger
“A champion is someone who gets up when they can’t.” \n - Jack Dempsey
¨Get comfortable with being uncomfortable!¨ \n – Jillian Michaels
